126 // compute linear index for given map coords
127 #define MAP_IDX(sx, i, j) ((sx) * (j) + (i))

129 SlamGMapping::SlamGMapping():
130  map_to_odom_(tf::Transform(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY( 0, 0, 0 ), tf::Point(0, 0, 0 ))),
131  laser_count_(0), private_nh_("~"), scan_filter_sub_(NULL), scan_filter_(NULL), transform_thread_(NULL)
132 {
133  seed_ = time(NULL);
134  init();
135 }

137 SlamGMapping::SlamGMapping(long unsigned int seed, long unsigned int max_duration_buffer):
138  map_to_odom_(tf::Transform(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY( 0, 0, 0 ), tf::Point(0, 0, 0 ))),
139  laser_count_(0), private_nh_("~"), scan_filter_sub_(NULL), scan_filter_(NULL), transform_thread_(NULL),
140  seed_(seed), tf_(ros::Duration(max_duration_buffer))
141 {
142  init();
143 }

146 void SlamGMapping::init()
147 {
148  // log4cxx::Logger::getLogger(ROSCONSOLE_DEFAULT_NAME)->setLevel(ros::console::g_level_lookup[ros::console::levels::Debug]);
149 
150  // The library is pretty chatty
151  //gsp_ = new GMapping::GridSlamProcessor(std::cerr);
152  gsp_ = new GMapping::GridSlamProcessor();
153  ROS_ASSERT(gsp_);
154 
155  tfB_ = new tf::TransformBroadcaster();
156  ROS_ASSERT(tfB_);
157 
158  gsp_laser_ = NULL;
159  gsp_odom_ = NULL;
160 
161  got_first_scan_ = false;
162  got_map_ = false;
163 
164 
165 
166  // Parameters used by our GMapping wrapper
167  if(!private_nh_.getParam("throttle_scans", throttle_scans_))
168  throttle_scans_ = 1;
169  if(!private_nh_.getParam("base_frame", base_frame_))
170  base_frame_ = "base_link";
171  if(!private_nh_.getParam("map_frame", map_frame_))
172  map_frame_ = "map";
173  if(!private_nh_.getParam("odom_frame", odom_frame_))
174  odom_frame_ = "odom";
175 
176  private_nh_.param("transform_publish_period", transform_publish_period_, 0.05);
177 
178  double tmp;
179  if(!private_nh_.getParam("map_update_interval", tmp))
180  tmp = 5.0;
181  map_update_interval_.fromSec(tmp);
182 
183  // Parameters used by GMapping itself
184  maxUrange_ = 0.0; maxRange_ = 0.0; // preliminary default, will be set in initMapper()
185  if(!private_nh_.getParam("minimumScore", minimum_score_))
186  minimum_score_ = 0;
187  if(!private_nh_.getParam("sigma", sigma_))
188  sigma_ = 0.05;
189  if(!private_nh_.getParam("kernelSize", kernelSize_))
190  kernelSize_ = 1;
191  if(!private_nh_.getParam("lstep", lstep_))
192  lstep_ = 0.05;
193  if(!private_nh_.getParam("astep", astep_))
194  astep_ = 0.05;
195  if(!private_nh_.getParam("iterations", iterations_))
196  iterations_ = 5;
197  if(!private_nh_.getParam("lsigma", lsigma_))
198  lsigma_ = 0.075;
199  if(!private_nh_.getParam("ogain", ogain_))
200  ogain_ = 3.0;
201  if(!private_nh_.getParam("lskip", lskip_))
202  lskip_ = 0;
203  if(!private_nh_.getParam("srr", srr_))
204  srr_ = 0.1;
205  if(!private_nh_.getParam("srt", srt_))
206  srt_ = 0.2;
207  if(!private_nh_.getParam("str", str_))
208  str_ = 0.1;
209  if(!private_nh_.getParam("stt", stt_))
210  stt_ = 0.2;
211  if(!private_nh_.getParam("linearUpdate", linearUpdate_))
212  linearUpdate_ = 1.0;
213  if(!private_nh_.getParam("angularUpdate", angularUpdate_))
214  angularUpdate_ = 0.5;
215  if(!private_nh_.getParam("temporalUpdate", temporalUpdate_))
216  temporalUpdate_ = -1.0;
217  if(!private_nh_.getParam("resampleThreshold", resampleThreshold_))
218  resampleThreshold_ = 0.5;
219  if(!private_nh_.getParam("particles", particles_))
220  particles_ = 30;
221  if(!private_nh_.getParam("xmin", xmin_))
222  xmin_ = -100.0;
223  if(!private_nh_.getParam("ymin", ymin_))
224  ymin_ = -100.0;
225  if(!private_nh_.getParam("xmax", xmax_))
226  xmax_ = 100.0;
227  if(!private_nh_.getParam("ymax", ymax_))
228  ymax_ = 100.0;
229  if(!private_nh_.getParam("delta", delta_))
230  delta_ = 0.05;
231  if(!private_nh_.getParam("occ_thresh", occ_thresh_))
232  occ_thresh_ = 0.25;
233  if(!private_nh_.getParam("llsamplerange", llsamplerange_))
234  llsamplerange_ = 0.01;
235  if(!private_nh_.getParam("llsamplestep", llsamplestep_))
236  llsamplestep_ = 0.01;
237  if(!private_nh_.getParam("lasamplerange", lasamplerange_))
238  lasamplerange_ = 0.005;
239  if(!private_nh_.getParam("lasamplestep", lasamplestep_))
240  lasamplestep_ = 0.005;
241 
242  if(!private_nh_.getParam("tf_delay", tf_delay_))
243  tf_delay_ = transform_publish_period_;
244 
245 }

247 
248 void SlamGMapping::startLiveSlam()
249 {
250  entropy_publisher_ = private_nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("entropy", 1, true);
251  sst_ = node_.advertise<nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid>("map", 1, true);
252  sstm_ = node_.advertise<nav_msgs::MapMetaData>("map_metadata", 1, true);
253  ss_ = node_.advertiseService("dynamic_map", &SlamGMapping::mapCallback, this);
254  scan_filter_sub_ = new message_filters::Subscriber<sensor_msgs::LaserScan>(node_, "scan", 5);
255  scan_filter_ = new tf::MessageFilter<sensor_msgs::LaserScan>(*scan_filter_sub_, tf_, odom_frame_, 5);
256  scan_filter_->registerCallback(boost::bind(&SlamGMapping::laserCallback, this, _1));
257 
258  transform_thread_ = new boost::thread(boost::bind(&SlamGMapping::publishLoop, this, transform_publish_period_));
259 }
260 
261 void SlamGMapping::startReplay(const std::string & bag_fname, std::string scan_topic)
262 {
263  double transform_publish_period;
264  ros::NodeHandle private_nh_("~");
265  entropy_publisher_ = private_nh_.advertise<std_msgs::Float64>("entropy", 1, true);
266  sst_ = node_.advertise<nav_msgs::OccupancyGrid>("map", 1, true);
267  sstm_ = node_.advertise<nav_msgs::MapMetaData>("map_metadata", 1, true);
268  ss_ = node_.advertiseService("dynamic_map", &SlamGMapping::mapCallback, this);
269 
270  rosbag::Bag bag;
271  bag.open(bag_fname, rosbag::bagmode::Read);
272 
273  std::vector<std::string> topics;
274  topics.push_back(std::string("/tf"));
275  topics.push_back(scan_topic);
276  rosbag::View viewall(bag, rosbag::TopicQuery(topics));
277 
278  // Store up to 5 messages and there error message (if they cannot be processed right away)
279  std::queue<std::pair<sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr, std::string> > s_queue;
280  foreach(rosbag::MessageInstance const m, viewall)
281  {
282  tf::tfMessage::ConstPtr cur_tf = m.instantiate<tf::tfMessage>();
283  if (cur_tf != NULL) {
284  for (size_t i = 0; i < cur_tf->transforms.size(); ++i)
285  {
286  geometry_msgs::TransformStamped transformStamped;
287  tf::StampedTransform stampedTf;
288  transformStamped = cur_tf->transforms[i];
289  tf::transformStampedMsgToTF(transformStamped, stampedTf);
290  tf_.setTransform(stampedTf);
291  }
292  }
293 
294  sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr s = m.instantiate<sensor_msgs::LaserScan>();
295  if (s != NULL) {
296  if (!(ros::Time(s->header.stamp)).is_zero())
297  {
298  s_queue.push(std::make_pair(s, ""));
299  }
300  // Just like in live processing, only process the latest 5 scans
301  if (s_queue.size() > 5) {
302  ROS_WARN_STREAM("Dropping old scan: " << s_queue.front().second);
303  s_queue.pop();
304  }
305  // ignoring un-timestamped tf data
306  }
307 
308  // Only process a scan if it has tf data
309  while (!s_queue.empty())
310  {
311  try
312  {
313  tf::StampedTransform t;
314  tf_.lookupTransform(s_queue.front().first->header.frame_id, odom_frame_, s_queue.front().first->header.stamp, t);
315  this->laserCallback(s_queue.front().first);
316  s_queue.pop();
317  }
318  // If tf does not have the data yet
319  catch(tf2::TransformException& e)
320  {
321  // Store the error to display it if we cannot process the data after some time
322  s_queue.front().second = std::string(e.what());
323  break;
324  }
325  }
326  }
327 
328  bag.close();
329 }
330 
331 void SlamGMapping::publishLoop(double transform_publish_period){
332  if(transform_publish_period == 0)
333  return;
334 
335  ros::Rate r(1.0 / transform_publish_period);
336  while(ros::ok()){
337  publishTransform();
338  r.sleep();
339  }
340 }
341 
342 SlamGMapping::~SlamGMapping()
343 {
344  if(transform_thread_){
345  transform_thread_->join();
346  delete transform_thread_;
347  }
348 
349  delete gsp_;
350  if(gsp_laser_)
351  delete gsp_laser_;
352  if(gsp_odom_)
353  delete gsp_odom_;
354  if (scan_filter_)
355  delete scan_filter_;
356  if (scan_filter_sub_)
357  delete scan_filter_sub_;
358 }
359 
360 bool
361 SlamGMapping::getOdomPose(GMapping::OrientedPoint& gmap_pose, const ros::Time& t)
362 {
363  // Get the pose of the centered laser at the right time
364  centered_laser_pose_.stamp_ = t;
365  // Get the laser's pose that is centered
366  tf::Stamped<tf::Transform> odom_pose;
367  try
368  {
369  tf_.transformPose(odom_frame_, centered_laser_pose_, odom_pose);
370  }
371  catch(tf::TransformException e)
372  {
373  ROS_WARN("Failed to compute odom pose, skipping scan (%s)", e.what());
374  return false;
375  }
376  double yaw = tf::getYaw(odom_pose.getRotation());
377 
378  gmap_pose = GMapping::OrientedPoint(odom_pose.getOrigin().x(),
379  odom_pose.getOrigin().y(),
380  yaw);
381  return true;
382 }
383 
394 bool
395 SlamGMapping::initMapper(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& scan)
396 {
397  laser_frame_ = scan.header.frame_id;
398  // Get the laser's pose, relative to base.
399  tf::Stamped<tf::Pose> ident; //ident为激光系下点
400  tf::Stamped<tf::Transform> laser_pose;
401  ident.setIdentity();
402  ident.frame_id_ = laser_frame_;
403  ident.stamp_ = scan.header.stamp;
404  try
405  {
406  tf_.transformPose(base_frame_, ident, laser_pose); //laser_pose是基坐标系下的表示
407  }
408  catch(tf::TransformException e)
409  {
410  ROS_WARN("Failed to compute laser pose, aborting initialization (%s)",
411  e.what());
412  return false;
413  }
414 
415  // create a point 1m above the laser position and transform it into the laser-frame
416  tf::Vector3 v;
417  v.setValue(0, 0, 1 + laser_pose.getOrigin().z());
418  tf::Stamped<tf::Vector3> up(v, scan.header.stamp,base_frame_); //up是基坐标系下的点
419  try
420  {
421  tf_.transformPoint(laser_frame_, up, up); //up转回激光系下
422  ROS_DEBUG("Z-Axis in sensor frame: %.3f", up.z());
423  }
424  catch(tf::TransformException& e)
425  {
426  ROS_WARN("Unable to determine orientation of laser: %s",
427  e.what());
428  return false;
429  }
430 
431  // gmapping doesnt take roll or pitch into account. So check for correct sensor alignment.
432  if (fabs(fabs(up.z()) - 1) > 0.001) //判断安装是否水平。 对齐。 z轴的偏转
433  {
434  ROS_WARN("Laser has to be mounted planar! Z-coordinate has to be 1 or -1, but gave: %.5f",
435  up.z());
436  return false;
437  }
438 
439  gsp_laser_beam_count_ = scan.ranges.size();// 激光点的数量
440 
441  double angle_center = (scan.angle_min + scan.angle_max)/2;
442 
443  if (up.z() > 0) // 激光向上安装
444  {
445  do_reverse_range_ = scan.angle_min > scan.angle_max; // 解析激光数据是否反转的标志
446  centered_laser_pose_ = tf::Stamped<tf::Pose>(tf::Transform(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0,0,angle_center),
447  tf::Vector3(0,0,0)), ros::Time::now(), laser_frame_);
448  ROS_INFO("Laser is mounted upwards.");
449  }
450  else //激光向下安装
451  {
452  do_reverse_range_ = scan.angle_min < scan.angle_max;
453  centered_laser_pose_ = tf::Stamped<tf::Pose>(tf::Transform(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(M_PI,0,-angle_center),
454  tf::Vector3(0,0,0)), ros::Time::now(), laser_frame_);
455  ROS_INFO("Laser is mounted upside down.");
456  }
457 
458  // Compute the angles of the laser from -x to x, basically symmetric and in increasing order
459  laser_angles_.resize(scan.ranges.size());
460  // Make sure angles are started so that they are centered
461  double theta = - std::fabs(scan.angle_min - scan.angle_max)/2; //角度对称表示××××××
462  for(unsigned int i=0; i<scan.ranges.size(); ++i)
463  {
464  laser_angles_[i]=theta;
465  theta += std::fabs(scan.angle_increment); //laser_angles_ 激光角度值×××××
466  }
467 
468  ROS_DEBUG("Laser angles in laser-frame: min: %.3f max: %.3f inc: %.3f", scan.angle_min, scan.angle_max,
469  scan.angle_increment);
470  ROS_DEBUG("Laser angles in top-down centered laser-frame: min: %.3f max: %.3f inc: %.3f", laser_angles_.front(),
471  laser_angles_.back(), std::fabs(scan.angle_increment));
472 
473  GMapping::OrientedPoint gmap_pose(0, 0, 0);
474 
475  // setting maxRange and maxUrange here so we can set a reasonable default
476  ros::NodeHandle private_nh_("~");
477  if(!private_nh_.getParam("maxRange", maxRange_))
478  maxRange_ = scan.range_max - 0.01;
479  if(!private_nh_.getParam("maxUrange", maxUrange_))
480  maxUrange_ = maxRange_;
481 
482  // The laser must be called "FLASER".
483  // We pass in the absolute value of the computed angle increment, on the
484  // assumption that GMapping requires a positive angle increment. If the
485  // actual increment is negative, we'll swap the order of ranges before
486  // feeding each scan to GMapping.
487  //创建sensor数据格式
488  gsp_laser_ = new GMapping::RangeSensor("FLASER",//name
489  gsp_laser_beam_count_,
490  fabs(scan.angle_increment), //正角度增量
491  gmap_pose,
492  0.0,
493  maxRange_);
494  ROS_ASSERT(gsp_laser_);
495 
496  GMapping::SensorMap smap; //std::map<std::string, Sensor*>
497  smap.insert(make_pair(gsp_laser_->getName(), gsp_laser_));
498  gsp_->setSensorMap(smap);//Construct the angle table for the sensor
499 
500  gsp_odom_ = new GMapping::OdometrySensor(odom_frame_);
501  ROS_ASSERT(gsp_odom_);
502 
503 
505  GMapping::OrientedPoint initialPose;
506  if(!getOdomPose(initialPose, scan.header.stamp))// centered_laser_pose_ 在odom_frame
507  {
508  ROS_WARN("Unable to determine inital pose of laser! Starting point will be set to zero.");
509  initialPose = GMapping::OrientedPoint(0.0, 0.0, 0.0);
510  }
511 
512  gsp_->setMatchingParameters(maxUrange_, maxRange_, sigma_,
513  kernelSize_, lstep_, astep_, iterations_,
514  lsigma_, ogain_, lskip_); //scan matcher param
515 
516  gsp_->setMotionModelParameters(srr_, srt_, str_, stt_); //运动模型噪声参数 <gmapping/gridfastslam/motionmodel.h>
517  gsp_->setUpdateDistances(linearUpdate_, angularUpdate_, resampleThreshold_);//更新触发设置
518  gsp_->setUpdatePeriod(temporalUpdate_);//更新频率
519  gsp_->setgenerateMap(false);//generate an accupancy grid map
520  gsp_->GridSlamProcessor::init(particles_, xmin_, ymin_, xmax_, ymax_,//ScanMatcherMap lmap
521  delta_, initialPose);//初始化××××××××××× m_particles 粒子初始化：pose+lmap
522 
523  gsp_->setllsamplerange(llsamplerange_); //采样参数设置
524  gsp_->setllsamplestep(llsamplestep_);
528  gsp_->setlasamplerange(lasamplerange_);
529  gsp_->setlasamplestep(lasamplestep_);
530  gsp_->setminimumScore(minimum_score_);
531 
532  // Call the sampling function once to set the seed.
533  GMapping::sampleGaussian(1,seed_); //高斯分布
534 
535  ROS_INFO("Initialization complete");
536 
537  return true;
538 }
539 
540 bool
541 SlamGMapping::addScan(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& scan, GMapping::OrientedPoint& gmap_pose)
542 {
543  if(!getOdomPose(gmap_pose, scan.header.stamp)) // (odom_frame_, centered_laser_pose_, odom_pose);
544  return false;
545 
546  if(scan.ranges.size() != gsp_laser_beam_count_)
547  return false;
548 
549  // GMapping wants an array of doubles...
550  double* ranges_double = new double[scan.ranges.size()];
551  // If the angle increment is negative, we have to invert the order of the readings.
552  if (do_reverse_range_)
553  {
554  ROS_DEBUG("Inverting scan");
555  int num_ranges = scan.ranges.size();
556  for(int i=0; i < num_ranges; i++)
557  {
558  // Must filter out short readings, because the mapper won't
559  if(scan.ranges[num_ranges - i - 1] < scan.range_min)
560  ranges_double[i] = (double)scan.range_max;
561  else
562  ranges_double[i] = (double)scan.ranges[num_ranges - i - 1];
563  }
564  } else
565  {
566  for(unsigned int i=0; i < scan.ranges.size(); i++)
567  {
568  // Must filter out short readings, because the mapper won't
569  if(scan.ranges[i] < scan.range_min)
570  ranges_double[i] = (double)scan.range_max;
571  else
572  ranges_double[i] = (double)scan.ranges[i];
573  }
574  }
575 
576  GMapping::RangeReading reading(scan.ranges.size(),
577  ranges_double,
578  gsp_laser_,
579  scan.header.stamp.toSec());
580 
581  // ...but it deep copies them in RangeReading constructor, so we don't
582  // need to keep our array around.
583  delete[] ranges_double;
584 
585  reading.setPose(gmap_pose);
586 
587  /*
588  ROS_DEBUG("scanpose (%.3f): %.3f %.3f %.3f\n",
589  scan.header.stamp.toSec(),
590  gmap_pose.x,
591  gmap_pose.y,
592  gmap_pose.theta);
593  */
594  ROS_DEBUG("processing scan");
595 
596  return gsp_->processScan(reading);//×××××××
597 }
598 
599 
600 void
601 SlamGMapping::laserCallback(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan::ConstPtr& scan)
602 {
603  laser_count_++;
604  if ((laser_count_ % throttle_scans_) != 0) //throttle_scans_
605  return;
606 
607  static ros::Time last_map_update(0,0);
608 
609  // We can't initialize the mapper until we've got the first scan
610  if(!got_first_scan_)//got_first_scan_
611  {
612  if(!initMapper(*scan))
613  return;
614  got_first_scan_ = true;
615  }
616 
617  GMapping::OrientedPoint odom_pose;
618 
619  if(addScan(*scan, odom_pose))
620  {
621  ROS_DEBUG("scan processed");
622 
623  GMapping::OrientedPoint mpose = gsp_->getParticles()[gsp_->getBestParticleIndex()].pose;
624  ROS_DEBUG("new best pose: %.3f %.3f %.3f", mpose.x, mpose.y, mpose.theta);
625  ROS_DEBUG("odom pose: %.3f %.3f %.3f", odom_pose.x, odom_pose.y, odom_pose.theta);
626  ROS_DEBUG("correction: %.3f %.3f %.3f", mpose.x - odom_pose.x, mpose.y - odom_pose.y, mpose.theta - odom_pose.theta);
627 
628  tf::Transform laser_to_map = tf::Transform(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, 0, mpose.theta), tf::Vector3(mpose.x, mpose.y, 0.0)).inverse();
629  tf::Transform odom_to_laser = tf::Transform(tf::createQuaternionFromRPY(0, 0, odom_pose.theta), tf::Vector3(odom_pose.x, odom_pose.y, 0.0));
630 
631  map_to_odom_mutex_.lock();
632  map_to_odom_ = (odom_to_laser * laser_to_map).inverse();
633  map_to_odom_mutex_.unlock();
634 
635  if(!got_map_ || (scan->header.stamp - last_map_update) > map_update_interval_) //map_update_interval_ 地图更新速率
636  {
637  updateMap(*scan);
638  last_map_update = scan->header.stamp;
639  ROS_DEBUG("Updated the map");
640  }
641  } else
642  ROS_DEBUG("cannot process scan");
643 }
644 
645 double
646 SlamGMapping::computePoseEntropy()
647 {
648  double weight_total=0.0;
649  for(std::vector<GMapping::GridSlamProcessor::Particle>::const_iterator it = gsp_->getParticles().begin();
650  it != gsp_->getParticles().end();
651  ++it)
652  {
653  weight_total += it->weight;
654  }
655  double entropy = 0.0;
656  for(std::vector<GMapping::GridSlamProcessor::Particle>::const_iterator it = gsp_->getParticles().begin();
657  it != gsp_->getParticles().end();
658  ++it)
659  {
660  if(it->weight/weight_total > 0.0)
661  entropy += it->weight/weight_total * log(it->weight/weight_total);
662  }
663  return -entropy;
664 }
665 
666 void
667 SlamGMapping::updateMap(const sensor_msgs::LaserScan& scan)
668 {
669  ROS_DEBUG("Update map");
670  boost::mutex::scoped_lock map_lock (map_mutex_);
671  GMapping::ScanMatcher matcher;
672 
673  matcher.setLaserParameters(scan.ranges.size(), &(laser_angles_[0]),
674  gsp_laser_->getPose());
675 
676  matcher.setlaserMaxRange(maxRange_);
677  matcher.setusableRange(maxUrange_);
678  matcher.setgenerateMap(true);
679 
680  GMapping::GridSlamProcessor::Particle best =
681  gsp_->getParticles()[gsp_->getBestParticleIndex()];
682  std_msgs::Float64 entropy;
683  entropy.data = computePoseEntropy();
684  if(entropy.data > 0.0)
685  entropy_publisher_.publish(entropy);
686 
687  if(!got_map_) {
688  map_.map.info.resolution = delta_;
689  map_.map.info.origin.position.x = 0.0;
690  map_.map.info.origin.position.y = 0.0;
691  map_.map.info.origin.position.z = 0.0;
692  map_.map.info.origin.orientation.x = 0.0;
693  map_.map.info.origin.orientation.y = 0.0;
694  map_.map.info.origin.orientation.z = 0.0;
695  map_.map.info.origin.orientation.w = 1.0;
696  }
697 
698  GMapping::Point center;
699  center.x=(xmin_ + xmax_) / 2.0;
700  center.y=(ymin_ + ymax_) / 2.0;
701 
702  GMapping::ScanMatcherMap smap(center, xmin_, ymin_, xmax_, ymax_,
703  delta_);
704 
705  ROS_DEBUG("Trajectory tree:");
706  for(GMapping::GridSlamProcessor::TNode* n = best.node;
707  n;
708  n = n->parent)
709  {
710  ROS_DEBUG(" %.3f %.3f %.3f",
711  n->pose.x,
712  n->pose.y,
713  n->pose.theta);
714  if(!n->reading)
715  {
716  ROS_DEBUG("Reading is NULL");
717  continue;
718  }
719  matcher.invalidateActiveArea();
720  matcher.computeActiveArea(smap, n->pose, &((*n->reading)[0]));
721  matcher.registerScan(smap, n->pose, &((*n->reading)[0]));
722  }
723 
724  // the map may have expanded, so resize ros message as well 地图尺寸
725  if(map_.map.info.width != (unsigned int) smap.getMapSizeX() || map_.map.info.height != (unsigned int) smap.getMapSizeY()) {
726 
727  // NOTE: The results of ScanMatcherMap::getSize() are different from the parameters given to the constructor
728  // so we must obtain the bounding box in a different way
729  GMapping::Point wmin = smap.map2world(GMapping::IntPoint(0, 0));
730  GMapping::Point wmax = smap.map2world(GMapping::IntPoint(smap.getMapSizeX(), smap.getMapSizeY()));
731  xmin_ = wmin.x; ymin_ = wmin.y;
732  xmax_ = wmax.x; ymax_ = wmax.y;
733 
734  ROS_DEBUG("map size is now %dx%d pixels (%f,%f)-(%f, %f)", smap.getMapSizeX(), smap.getMapSizeY(),
735  xmin_, ymin_, xmax_, ymax_);
736 
737  map_.map.info.width = smap.getMapSizeX();
738  map_.map.info.height = smap.getMapSizeY();
739  map_.map.info.origin.position.x = xmin_;
740  map_.map.info.origin.position.y = ymin_;
741  map_.map.data.resize(map_.map.info.width * map_.map.info.height);
742 
743  ROS_DEBUG("map origin: (%f, %f)", map_.map.info.origin.position.x, map_.map.info.origin.position.y);
744  }
745 
746  for(int x=0; x < smap.getMapSizeX(); x++) //占据设置
747  {
748  for(int y=0; y < smap.getMapSizeY(); y++)
749  {
751  GMapping::IntPoint p(x, y);
752  double occ=smap.cell(p);
753  assert(occ <= 1.0);
754  if(occ < 0)
755  map_.map.data[MAP_IDX(map_.map.info.width, x, y)] = -1;
756  else if(occ > occ_thresh_)
757  {
758  //map_.map.data[MAP_IDX(map_.map.info.width, x, y)] = (int)round(occ*100.0);
759  map_.map.data[MAP_IDX(map_.map.info.width, x, y)] = 100;
760  }
761  else
762  map_.map.data[MAP_IDX(map_.map.info.width, x, y)] = 0;
763  }
764  }
765  got_map_ = true;
766 
767  //make sure to set the header information on the map
768  map_.map.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
769  map_.map.header.frame_id = tf_.resolve( map_frame_ );
770 
771  sst_.publish(map_.map);
772  sstm_.publish(map_.map.info);
773 }
774 
775 bool
776 SlamGMapping::mapCallback(nav_msgs::GetMap::Request &req,
777  nav_msgs::GetMap::Response &res)
778 {
779  boost::mutex::scoped_lock map_lock (map_mutex_);
780  if(got_map_ && map_.map.info.width && map_.map.info.height)
781  {
782  res = map_;
783  return true;
784  }
785  else
786  return false;
787 }
788 
789 void SlamGMapping::publishTransform()
790 {
791  map_to_odom_mutex_.lock();
792  ros::Time tf_expiration = ros::Time::now() + ros::Duration(tf_delay_);
793  tfB_->sendTransform( tf::StampedTransform (map_to_odom_, tf_expiration, map_frame_, odom_frame_));
794  map_to_odom_mutex_.unlock();
795 }
